title: BuckeyeMatch
description: Buckeye Match was a web app I built in a group, made to help Ohio State students meet new roommates. It employs visually intriguing graphics designed by me as well as filtering and direct message functionality.

title: CORE Interpreter
description: An interpreter for a language called CORE. Written in Java using recursive descent parsing.

title: Intersection AI Simulation
description: Simulation of an intersection written in C# using Unity (done with a partner). Implements various alorgithms and techniques from my game and animation course.

title: North Meadows
description: This web app and graphic design was a solo project of mine. North Meadows Townhomes is a housing community in central Ohio.

title: Calculator
description: NOTE: Must be used in FireFox only. A binary/hex/decimal calculator I made with a team. It's implemented with raw CSS/SCSS and vanilla JavaScript. ERB/Middleman was our build tool for static sites.

title: Bass Music
description: Bass Music was a demo I built to further my experience with web apps. It is a music catalog (although no actual audio is hosted).

title: BL Parser
description: A recursive descent parser for a made-up language called BL. It uses Ohio State's Java components and data structures for implementation.
